====== gas +

// 1 stage
1. Deploy token contract
Transaction cost: 959043 gas.

2. Deploy pre-ico crowdsale contract
Transaction cost: 1686376 gas. 

3. Change token owner
Transaction cost: 30820 gas. 

4. Pay
Transaction cost: 148209 gas.  

5. Finalize pre-ico
Transaction cost: 61246 gas. 
Transaction cost: 54546 gas. 

// 2 stage
6. Deploy main crowdsale contract
Transaction cost: 1968927 gas. 

7. Change token owner
Transaction cost: 30820 gas. 

8. Init main crowdsale contract (invoke init())
Transaction cost: 138179 gas.
totalSupply 9999999999999999999998861 -> 33999999999999999999998861

9. Pay
Transaction cost: 120437 gas. 

67898305079999999999998861
200000000000000000000000000
169596610150507999999998861
totalSupply 199999999999999999999999498
weiRaized 48970000006855800000960
14 691 000,002056740000288 USD
HARD CAP: 13,280,000  $ Price including the bonus = 0.08 

10. Finalize main crowdsale
Transaction cost: 77994 gas.
